goal: Update the Vue.js client application to add a new dashboard feature

steps.name: Analyze existing Vue components
steps.prompt: Review the Code/client/src/components directory to understand the existing component structure and identify where to add the new dashboard component.

steps.name: Create dashboard component
steps.prompt: Create a new Vue component for the dashboard that displays metrics from the backend API. Use the existing component patterns found in the codebase.

steps.name: Update router configuration
steps.prompt: Add the new dashboard route to the Vue router configuration to make it accessible from the navigation.
